stepAnswer: He can highlight the range with the flour inventory, open the Format menu, then select conditional formatting
stepTitle: Yousef is reviewing his store inventory. He wants his Google Sheet to visually identify cells where the store's flour inventory fell below $$100$$ bags. What does he need to do in order for Google Sheets to do this automatically?
choices: He can highlight the cells with flour inventory, open the Data menu, then select Named ranges
He can highlight the range with the flour inventory, open the Format menu, then select conditional formatting
He can highlight the column with flour inventory, open the Data menu, then select Create a filter
He can highlight the cells with flour inventory, open the Format menu, then select Alternating colors
